title: Digital Game-Based Elementary Mathematics Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and general familiarity with game design
context.additional_context: A course developing competencies in designing elementary mathematics educational games in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can write a game design document aligned with the 2013 elementary mathematics curriculum by applying the DGBL-ID methodology
Learners can develop one prototype of an interactive math game implementable in smartphone environments
Learners can explain three or more game interface design principles reflecting learner characteristics (elementary students)

resources: Mobile Game Development Tools (Unity/Unreal Engine Mobile)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
